author: senh
title: An Ancient Tongue and Paella’s Scent Fill a Boise Celebration of Basque Roots
text: BING NEWS: An Ancient Tongue and Paella’s Scent Fill a Boise Celebration of Basque Roots BOISE, Idaho — When the president of the Basques arrived here in Idaho’s capital from Europe late last month, the mayor stepped up to interpret for him into English from Basque, one of the world’s most ancient and difficult languages. “Boise is ...
